summary: MICHELIN 305/85R22.5 XZU3 (J) SAME FAILURES THAT CAUSED THE VOLUNTARY RECALL OF 2012.  ALL REMAINING PRODUCTION DATES AFTER THE RECALL (2011-WEEK 45 AND FORWARD).   BEAD PLY SEPARATION AFTER 100,000 MILES.  TIRES ARE BLOWING OUT FROM THE BEAD ON BUSES.  MICHELIN REPRESENTATIVES  HAVE ACKNOWLEDGED THAT THERE IS A PROBLEM AND INSTRUCTED US TO REMOVE ALL 2011 (POST RECALL) /2012 / 2013 TIRES FROM FLEET.  THIS IS DEFINITELY A SAFETY ISSUE.
